Whats changed: 
1. Switched from 8.1 SDK to 10.0.10240 (Win10), 
   - added ARM configuration, fixed machine type for ARM Configuration
   - added ipv6 support
2. Added win store support definition:
  CURL_WINDOWS_APP
3. Added curl build definitions: 
  CURL_DISABLE_FTP
  CURL_DISABLE_LDAP
  CURL_DISABLE_LDAPS
  CURL_DISABLE_TELNET
  CURL_DISABLE_DICT
  CURL_DISABLE_FILE
  CURL_DISABLE_TFTP
  CURL_DISABLE_RTSP
  CURL_DISABLE_POP3
  CURL_DISABLE_IMAP
  CURL_DISABLE_SMTP
  CURL_DISABLE_GOPHER
3. Added include directory for OpenSSL
  dava.framework/Libs/openssl/uwp
